00055 DoubleVect& Matrice_Diagonale::ajouter_multvect_( const DoubleVect& x, DoubleVect& r ) const
00056 {
00057   int count = coefficients_.size( );
00058 
00059   assert( x.size( ) ==count );
00060   assert( r.size( ) ==count );
00061 
00062   const double* c_ptr = coefficients_.addr( );
00063   const double* x_ptr = x.addr( );
00064   double* r_ptr = r.addr( );
00065 
00066   for ( ; count; count-- )
00067     {
00068       const double x_ = *x_ptr;
00069       const double c_ = *c_ptr;
00070       double& r_ = *( r_ptr++ );
00071       r_ += c_ * x_;
00072       x_ptr++;
00073     }
00074 
00075   return r;
00076 }
00077 
00078 DoubleVect& Matrice_Diagonale::ajouter_multvectT_( const DoubleVect& x, DoubleVect& r ) const
00079 {
00080   return ajouter_multvect_( x, r );
00081 }
00082 
00083 DoubleTab& Matrice_Diagonale::ajouter_multTab_( const DoubleTab& x, DoubleTab& r ) const
00084 {
00085   if ( ( x.nb_dim() == 1 ) && ( r.nb_dim() == 1 ) )
00086     {
00087       ajouter_multvect_( x, r );
00088       return r;
00089     }
00090 
00091   assert( x.nb_dim( ) == 2 );
00092   assert( r.nb_dim( ) == 2 );
00093 
00094   const int size = coefficients_.size( );
00095   assert( x.dimension( 0 ) == size );
00096   assert( r.dimension( 0 ) == size );
00097 
00098   const int nb_components = x.dimension( 1 );
00099   assert( r.dimension( 1 ) == nb_components );
00100 
00101   for ( int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00102     {
00103       const double coefficient = coefficients_( i );
00104       for ( int j=0; j<nb_components; ++j )
00105         {
00106           r( i, j ) += x( i, j ) * coefficient;
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110   return r;
00111 }

00113 void Matrice_Diagonale::scale( const double& x )
00114 {
00115   coefficients_ *= x;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Matrice_Diagonale::get_stencil( IntTab& stencil ) const
00119 {
00120   if( is_stencil_up_to_date_ )
00121     {
00122       stencil = stencil_;
00123       return;
00124     }
00125 
00126   const int size = ordre( );
00127 
00128   stencil.resize( size, 2 );
00129 
00130   for ( int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00131     {
00132       stencil( i, 0 ) = i;
00133       stencil( i, 1 ) = i;
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 void Matrice_Diagonale::get_symmetric_stencil( IntTab& stencil ) const
00138 {
00139   get_stencil( stencil );
00140 }
00141 
00142 void Matrice_Diagonale::get_stencil_and_coefficients( IntTab&      stencil,
00143                                                       ArrOfDouble& coefficients ) const
00144 {
00145   if( is_stencil_up_to_date_ )
00146     {
00147       if( coefficients_.size( ) == 0 )
00148         {
00149           Cerr << "Error in Matrice_Morse::get_stencil_and_coefficients( )"<<finl;
00150           Cerr << "  The coefficients are not filled."<<finl;
00151           Cerr << "  Aborting..." << finl;
00152           Process::abort( );
00153         }
00154       stencil = stencil_;
00155       coefficients  = coefficients_;
00156       return;
00157     }
00158   const int size = ordre( );
00159 
00160   stencil.resize( size, 2 );
00161   coefficients.resize_array( size );
00162 
00163   for ( int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00164     {
00165       stencil( i, 0 ) = i;
00166       stencil( i, 1 ) = i;
00167       coefficients[ i ] = coefficients_( i );
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 void Matrice_Diagonale::get_symmetric_stencil_and_coefficients( IntTab&      stencil,
00172                                                                 ArrOfDouble& coefficients ) const
00173 {
00174   get_stencil_and_coefficients( stencil,
00175                                 coefficients );
00176 }

00208 double  Matrice_Diagonale::coeff( int i, int j ) const
00209 {
00210   if ( i==j )
00211     {
00212       return coefficients_[ i ];
00213     }
00214   else
00215     {
00216       return 0.0;
00217     }
00218 }
00219 
00220 double& Matrice_Diagonale::coeff( int i, int j )
00221 {
00222   if ( i==j )
00223     {
00224       return coefficients_[ i ];
00225     }
00226 
00227   Cerr << "Error in 'Matrice_Diagonale::coeff()':" << finl;
00228   Cerr << "  non-const access is only allowed for diagonal coefficients" << finl;
00229   Process::exit( );
00230 
00231   return coefficients_[ 0];
00232 }
